Acid.descricao: 10% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

Acid Armor.descricao: Boosts the user's Defense by two stages.

Agility.descricao: Boosts the user's Speed by two stages.

Amnesia.descricao: Boosts the user's Special Defense by two stages.

Ancient Power.descricao: 10% chance to boost all stats by one stage.

Aromatherapy.descricao: Cures status on the user's team.

Assist.descricao: Uses a random move from the user's team.
Uses a random move from the user's team.

Astonish.descricao: 30% chance of causing the target to flinch.

Attract.descricao: Targets of the opposite gender are infatuated and have a 50% chance to do nothing.

Aurora Beam.descricao: 10% chance to lower the opposing Pokemon's Attack by one stage.

Barrier.descricao: Boosts the user's Defense by two stages.

Baton Pass.descricao: The user switches, passing on all stat changes and some special conditions.

Beat Up.descricao: All healthy Pokemon on the user's team aid in damaging the target.

Belly Drum.descricao: The user loses 50% of max HP. Maximizes the user's Attack.

Bide.descricao: Charges for two turns; returns double the damage received in those turns.

Bind.descricao: Deals damage to the target at the end of every turn for 2-5 turns.

Bite.descricao: 30% chance of causing the target to flinch.

Blaze Kick.descricao: High critical hit rate. 10% chance to burn the target.

Bone Club.descricao: 10% chance of causing the target to flinch.
10% chance of causing the target to flinch.

Bounce.descricao: The user is made invulnerable for one turn, then hits the next turn. 30% chance to paralyze the target.

Brick Break.descricao: Destroys Light Screen and Reflect, then hits.

Bubble.descricao: 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

Bubble Beam.descricao: 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

Bulk Up.descricao: Boosts the user's Attack and Defense by one stage each.

Calm Mind.descricao: Boosts the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage.

Camouflage.descricao: Changes the user's type to Normal in Link Battles.

Charge.descricao: Doubles power of an Electric-type move used next turn.

Charm.descricao: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.

Clamp.descricao: Deals damage to the target at the end of every turn for 2-5 turns.

Constrict.descricao: 10% chance to lower the target Speed by one stage.

Conversion.descricao: Changes the user into a new type based on its moves.

Conversion 2.descricao: Changes the user into a new type that resists the last attack to hit it.

Cosmic Power.descricao: Boosts the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.

Cotton Spore.descricao: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.

Counter.descricao: If hit by a physical attack, deals double the damage taken.

Crunch.descricao: 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Crush Claw.descricao: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

Curse.descricao: Does 1/4 of max HP damage per turn at the cost of half the user's max HP if the user is a Ghost-type. Boosts the user's Attack and Defense and lowers Speed by one stage each otherwise.

Defense Curl.descricao: Boosts the user's Defense by one stage.

Destiny Bond.descricao: If the user faints before using its next move, the attacker faints.

Detect.descricao: Prevents anything from working on the user that turn. Priority +3.
Prevents anything from working on the user that turn. Priority +3.

Dig.descricao: User is made invulnerable for one turn, then hits the next turn.

Disable.descricao: Prevents the last move used by the target from being used again for 2-5 turns.

Dive.descricao: User is made invulnerable for one turn, then hits the next turn.

Doom Desire.descricao: Deals damage at the end of the turn after three turns.

Double Team.descricao: Boosts the user's evasion by one stage.

Double-Edge.descricao: User takes one-third of damage dealt in recoil.

Dragon Dance.descricao: Boosts the user's Attack and Speed by one stage each.

Dream Eater.descricao: Leeches 50% of the damage dealt. Only works if the target is asleep.

Earthquake.descricao: Base Power doubles against Pokemon using Dig.
Base Power doubles against Pokemon using Dig.

Encore.descricao: Forces the target to repeat the last move it used for two to five turns.

Endeavor.descricao: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

Endure.descricao: The user survives with at least 1 HP. The chance of failure increases if it, Detect, Protect, Wide Guard, Quick Guard, King's Shield, or Spiky Shield was used successfully the previous turn. Priority +3.

Eruption.descricao: Does less damage as the user's HP decreases.

Explosion.descricao: Causes the user to faint. Foe's Defense is halved during damage calculation.

Extrasensory.descricao: 10% chance of causing the target to flinch.

Facade.descricao: Base Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

Fake Out.descricao: Always causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user's first turn out. Priority +1.

Fake Tears.descricao: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.

False Swipe.descricao: The target survives with at least 1 HP.

Feather Dance.descricao: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.

Fire Spin.descricao: Deals damage to the target at the end of every turn for 2-5 turns.

Flail.descricao: Does more damage as the user's HP decreases.

Flame Wheel.descricao: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws the user.

Flash.descricao: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

Flatter.descricao: Confuses the target and boosts its Special Attack by one stage.

Fly.descricao: User is made invulnerable for one turn, then hits the next turn.

Focus Energy.descricao: Boosts the user's critical hit rate by one stage.

Focus Punch.descricao: Fails if the user takes damage in the same turn before moving. Priority -3.

Follow Me.descricao: All moves used by foes subsequently in the turn target the user. Priority +3.

Foresight.descricao: Nullifies evasion modifiers. Allows Fighting- and Normal-type moves to hit Ghost-types.

Frustration.descricao: Base Power decreases proportionally to the user's happiness.

Fury Cutter.descricao: Power doubles with each consecutive use.

Future Sight.descricao: Deals damage at the end of the turn after three turns.

Growl.descricao: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

Growth.descricao: Boosts the user's Special Attack by one stage.

Grudge.descricao: If the user faints, the attack that KOed it loses all of its PP.

Gust.descricao: Base Power doubles if the target is using Fly.

Harden.descricao: Boosts the user's Defense by one stage.

Headbutt.descricao: 30% chance of causing the target to flinch.

Heal Bell.descricao: Cures status on the user's team.
Cures status on the user's team.

Helping Hand.descricao: Increases power of an ally's subsequent move by 50%. Priority +5.

Hidden Power Bug.descricao: Has 30-70 power and a type based on the user's IVs.

Hidden Power Dark.descricao: Has 30-70 power and a type based on the user's IVs.

Hidden Power Dragon.descricao: Has 30-70 power and a type based on the user's IVs.

High Jump Kick.descricao: If attack misses or fails, user loses HP equal to half the damage that would have been dealt.

Howl.descricao: Boosts the user's Attack by one stage.

Hyper Fang.descricao: 10% chance of causing the target to flinch.

Ice Ball.descricao: Power doubles with each use. Locks user in for 5 turns.

Icy Wind.descricao: Lowers foes' Speed by one stage.
Lowers foes' Speed by one stage.

Imprison.descricao: No foe can use any of the user's moves.

Ingrain.descricao: Heals the user by 1/16 of its max HP each turn and prevents it from switching and being forced to switch.

Iron Defense.descricao: Boosts the user's Defense by two stages.

Iron Tail.descricao: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

Jump Kick.descricao: If attack misses or fails, user loses HP equal to half the damage that would have been dealt.

Kinesis.descricao: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

Leech Seed.descricao: Leeches 1/8 of the target's HP each turn.

Leer.descricao: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.

Light Screen.descricao: Lowers the damage dealt by special attacks for 5 turns.

Lock-On.descricao: User's next move will always hit.

Low Kick.descricao: Deals damage based on the foe's weight.
Deals damage based on the foe's weight.

Luster Purge.descricao: 50% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Magic Coat.descricao: Bounces back certain non-damaging moves. Priority +4.

Meditate.descricao: Boosts the user's Attack by one stage.

Memento.descricao: User faints. Lowers the foe's Attack and Special Attack by two stages.

Metal Claw.descricao: 10% chance to boost the user's Attack by one stage.

Metal Sound.descricao: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.

Meteor Mash.descricao: 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by one stage.
20% chance to raise the user's Attack by one stage.

Milk Drink.descricao: Heals 50% of the user's max HP.

Mimic.descricao: Copies the last move used by the target.

Mind Reader.descricao: The the user's next move will always hit.

Minimize.descricao: Boosts the user's evasion by one stage.

Mirror Move.descricao: Uses the last move that hit the user.

Mist.descricao: Prevents moves that only lower stats from working for 5 turns.

Mist Ball.descricao: 50% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.

Moonlight.descricao: Heals variably depending on the weather.

Morning Sun.descricao: Heals variably depending on the weather.

Mud Shot.descricao: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.

Mud-Slap.descricao: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

Muddy Water.descricao: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

Needle Arm.descricao: 30% chance of causing the target to flinch.
30% chance of causing the target to flinch.

Night Shade.descricao: Deals damage equal to the user's level.

Nightmare.descricao: Deals 1/4 of a sleeping target's max HP per turn.

Octazooka.descricao: 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

Odor Sleuth.descricao: Blocks evasion modifiers. Allows Fighting- and Normal-type moves to hit Ghosts.

Outrage.descricao: Repeats for two to three turns. Confuses user at the end.

Overheat.descricao: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after use.

Pain Split.descricao: Averages the user's and the target's HP.

Perish Song.descricao: All active Pokemon faint after three turns.

Petal Dance.descricao: Repeats for two to three turns. Confuses the user at the end.

Poison Fang.descricao: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

Poison Tail.descricao: High critical hit rate. 10% chance to poison the target.

Present.descricao: Has random power and a chance to heal the target.

Protect.descricao: Prevents anything from working on the user that turn. Priority +3.

Psychic.descricao: 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Psycho Boost.descricao: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.

Psywave.descricao: Does random damage equal to .5x-1.5x the user's level.

Pursuit.descricao: Doubles in power and hits before the switch if the target switches. If the target switches, Priority +7. Otherwise, Priority +0.

Rage.descricao: Boosts Attack by one stage if hit.

Rapid Spin.descricao: Removes Leech Seed, partial trapping, and entry hazards if the user does not faint from subsequent recoil damage.

Razor Wind.descricao: Charges first turn; attacks on the second. High critical hit rate.
Charges first turn; attacks on the second. High critical hit rate.

Recover.descricao: Heals 50% of the user's max HP.

Reflect.descricao: Lowers the damage from physical attacks for 5 turns.

Rest.descricao: The user goes to sleep for two turns, restoring all HP.

Return.descricao: Base Power increases proportionally to the user's happiness.

Revenge.descricao: Doubles in power if user was damaged.

Reversal.descricao: Does more damage as the user's HP decreases.

Roar.descricao: Forces a switch to a random Pokemon. Priority -5.

Rock Slide.descricao: 30% chance of causing the target to flinch.

Rock Smash.descricao: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

Rock Tomb.descricao: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.

Role Play.descricao: Copies the foe's ability, overwriting the user's ability.

Rolling Kick.descricao: 30% chance of causing the target to flinch.

Rolling Kick.descricao: 30% chance of causing the target to flinch.

Rollout.descricao: Power doubles with each use. Locks user in for 5 turns.

Sacred Fire.descricao: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws the user.

Safeguard.descricao: Protects the user's team from status conditions for five turns.

Sand Attack.descricao: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

Sand Tomb.descricao: Traps and damages target over multiple turns.

Sandstorm.descricao: Summons a sandstorm for five turns.

Scary Face.descricao: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.

Screech.descricao: Lowers the target's Defense by two stages.

Seismic Toss.descricao: Deals damage equal to the user's level.

Self-Destruct.descricao: Causes the user to faint. Foe's Defense is halved during damage calculation.

Shadow Ball.descricao: 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Sharpen.descricao: Boosts the user's Attack by one stage.

Silver Wind.descricao: 10% chance to boost all the user's stats by one stage.

Sketch.descricao: Permanently copies the last move used by the target.

Skill Swap.descricao: The user and the target trade abilities.

Skull Bash.descricao: Charges and boosts the user's Defense by one stage turn one; attacks turn two.

Sky Attack.descricao: Hits the turn after being used.

Sky Uppercut.descricao: Can hit a Bouncing, Flying, or Sky Dropping target.

Slack Off.descricao: Heals 50% of the user's max HP.

Sleep Talk.descricao: Uses one of the user's moves at random. Can only be used while sleeping.

Smelling Salts.descricao: Base Power doubles if used on a paralyzed target but cures it of paralysis.
Base Power doubles if used on a paralyzed target but cures it of paralysis.

Smokescreen.descricao: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

Snatch.descricao: If certain moves are used, the user of Snatch uses the moves instead. Priority +4.

Snore.descricao: Fails if the user is awake. 30% chance of causing the target to flinch.

Soft-Boiled.descricao: Heals 50% of the user's max HP.

Spikes.descricao: Damages foes as they switch in.

Spit Up.descricao: Varies in power depending on the number of uses of Stockpile.

Spite.descricao: Takes away 2-5 PP from the last move the target used.

Steel Wing.descricao: 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by one stage.
10% chance to raise the user's Defense by one stage.

Stockpile.descricao: Fails if the user has already used Stockpile three times.

Stomp.descricao: 30% chance of causing the target to flinch.

String Shot.descricao: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage. Hits all adjacent foes.

Struggle.descricao: User takes half of damage dealt in recoil. Ghost-types take damage.

Submission.descricao: User takes a quarter of damage dealt in recoil.

Substitute.descricao: Takes 1/4 the user's max HP to create a Substitute that takes damage for the user.

Super Fang.descricao: Deals damage equal to half the target's current HP.

Superpower.descricao: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage each.

Swagger.descricao: Confuses the target and boosts its Attack by two stages.

Swallow.descricao: Healing varies based on the number of times the user has used Stockpile.
Healing varies based on the number of times the user has used Stockpile.

Sweet Scent.descricao: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage. Hits all adjacent foes.

Swords Dance.descricao: Boosts the user's Attack by two stages.

Synthesis.descricao: Heals variably depending on the weather.

Tail Glow.descricao: Boosts the user's Special Attack by two stages.

Tail Whip.descricao: Lowers the Defense of all opposing adjacent Pokemon by one stage.

Take Down.descricao: User takes a quarter of damage dealt in recoil.

Taunt.descricao: The target cannot use status moves for two turns or until it switches out.

Thrash.descricao: Repeats for two to three turns. Confuses the user at the end.

Thunder.descricao: 30% chance to paralyze the target. Never misses in rain.

Tickle.descricao: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by one stage each.

Torment.descricao: Prevents the target from using the same move twice in a row, except Struggle.

Transform.descricao: Transforms the user into the target, copying its type, stats, stat changes, moves, and ability.

Tri Attack.descricao: 20% chance to burn the target, freeze, or paralyze the target, with an equal chance for each.

Twineedle.descricao: Hits twice. Each hit has a 20% chance to poison the target.

Twister.descricao: 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

Uproar.descricao: Repeats for two to five turns. No Pokemon can sleep during these turns.

Vital Throw.descricao: Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. Priority -1.

Volt Tackle.descricao: User takes a third of damage dealt in recoil.

Volt Tackle.descricao: User takes a third of damage dealt in recoil.

Water Spout.descricao: Does less damage as the user's HP decreases.

Weather Ball.descricao: Base Power doubles and changes type based on the weather.

Whirlpool.descricao: Traps and damages target over multiple turns.

Whirlwind.descricao: Forces a switch to a random Pokemon. Priority -5.

Wish.descricao: Heals 50% of the user's max HP after two turns. Can heal an ally in the user's place.

Withdraw.descricao: Boosts the user's Defense by one stage.

Wrap.descricao: Deals damage to the target at the end of every turn for 2-5 turns.

Yawn.descricao: Puts the target to sleep after two turns.
